partitions.name: Dim_PURCHASE_ORDER_DESCRIPTIONS_PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE
partitions.expression:
let
            Source = Value.NativeQuery(
                #"SQL Database",
                "SELECT DISTINCT
            [RELEASE_NUMBER], [SITE_NUMBER], [PO_LINE_NUMBER], [PO_NUMBER],
            ISNULL(CAST([RELEASE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([SITE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([PO_LINE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([PO_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') as [PO_LINE_NUMBER_PO_NUMBER_RELEASE_NUMBER_SITE_NUMBER_Key]
        FROM (
            SELECT [RELEASE_NUMBER], [SITE_NUMBER], [PO_LINE_NUMBER], [PO_NUMBER] FROM [PURCHASE_ORDER_DESCRIPTIONS]
            UNION ALL
            SELECT [RELEASE_NUMBER], [SITE_NUMBER], [PO_LINE_NUMBER], [PO_NUMBER] FROM [PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE]
        ) AS CombinedKeys
        WHERE ISNULL(CAST([RELEASE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([SITE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([PO_LINE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([PO_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') IS NOT NULL AND ISNULL(CAST([RELEASE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([SITE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([PO_LINE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') + '|' + ISNULL(CAST([PO_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(50)), '') <> '''''",
                null, 
                [EnableFolding = true]
            )
        in
            Source
